item.description:
Please bring pencil/paper and your copy of The Artist's Way.
If you have a small piece of creative work you want to share, we will make time in the first 15 minutes!!
item.why: CHAPTERS 3-4 will be discussed. Please note this meetup will be CLOSED TO NEW MEMBERS after February 17 2011
item.name: FRESH START 2011: THE ARTIST'S WAY CH 1-12
